info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 22 at 6:24PM MDT until July 22 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
FFWEPZ
The National Weather Service in El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Southeastern Dona Ana County in south central New Mexico...
* Until 815 PM MDT.
* At 624 PM MDT, Thunderstorms have produced torrential rain over the southern Mesilla Valley, with 1 to 2 inches of rain around Berino, and up to 1 inch around Chamberino. Heavy rain has fallen downstream of retention dams, increasing the risk of flooding in the valley.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of arroyos and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Anthony, Berino and Chamberino.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Remain alert for flooding even in locations not receiving rain. Arroyos, streams, and rivers can become raging killer currents in a matter of minutes, even from distant rainfall.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 8:15 PM MDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 8:15 PM MDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 22 at 6:24PM MDT until July 22 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 8:15 PM MDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 8:15 PM MDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
